name: hot-translate
title: hot-translate
description:
Hot Translate is a simple translation addon.
Just select some text, press ALT+Q and you will see a notification window, with translated text. You can also select text and click addon button. In that case new tab with Yandex.Translate will be opened.
For now, addon can translate into this languages:
	* Russian
	* English
	* Deutsch
	* Spanish
	* Italian.
By default, it translates text into Russian language.
author: Oleg Senin <s.e.n.i.n@yandex.ru>
